Text: Trump using a church, NOT to pray or to read scripture. It was an awkard, PHOTO OP, where he held a Bible up in the air and pointed at it, like it was a Trump steak. People were pepper sprayed to make space for this. He is at best a mockery during this deeply depressing time.
Trump is testing to see whether he can get the military to do his bidding with his enemies. If he can, he is one giant step closer to full authoritarian control. No one should feel safe.

a thread on why what trump just did should scare you, and how we can prevent this from getting worse. trump recently passed insurrection act of 1807. this is in every way, MARTIAL LAW. and a declaration of war amongst the people. and here's what u need to know.
